scripts.pypoe:pull: cd ../.. && git subtree pull --squash --prefix=packages/datamine/PyPoE https://github.com/OmegaK2/PyPoE.git dev
scripts.export:main: bash -c "mkdir -p dist && pypoe_exporter dat json dist/all.json && date > dist/date"
scripts.export:lang: yarn export:lang:en && yarn export:lang:fr && yarn export:lang:de && yarn export:lang:ko && yarn export:lang:pt && yarn export:lang:ru && yarn export:lang:es && yarn export:lang:th
scripts.export:lang:fr: bash -c "pypoe_exporter dat json dist/lang/fr.json --lang French --files `node src/langFilenames.js`"
scripts.export:lang:de: bash -c "pypoe_exporter dat json dist/lang/de.json --lang German --files `node src/langFilenames.js`"
scripts.export:lang:ko: bash -c "pypoe_exporter dat json dist/lang/ko.json --lang Korean --files `node src/langFilenames.js`"
scripts.export:lang:pt: bash -c "pypoe_exporter dat json dist/lang/pt.json --lang Portuguese --files `node src/langFilenames.js`"
scripts.export:lang:ru: bash -c "pypoe_exporter dat json dist/lang/ru.json --lang Russian --files `node src/langFilenames.js`"
scripts.export:lang:es: bash -c "pypoe_exporter dat json dist/lang/es.json --lang Spanish --files `node src/langFilenames.js`"
scripts.export:lang:th: bash -c "pypoe_exporter dat json dist/lang/th.json --lang Thai --files `node src/langFilenames.js`"
